marketing-text: Open source platform for COVID19 data. Advanced dashboard with browser extension and free detailed REST API, localized into all languages.
name: Name
promo-message: Made with love ❤️ by the team at Hoobu.com. Plan your post-pandemic trip now with our awesome real-time collaborative trip planner
general-advice-wash-hands-description: Wash your hands frequently and for 20 seconds using soap and water after you blow your nose, cough or sneeze and before you eat or handle food. Proper hand washing is the most effective way of killing viruses.
general-advice-minimise-contact-descript: Minimise non-essential meetings & journeys and seek alternatives to greetings such as hand shakes, hugs or kisses.
general-advice-avoid-face-description: Hands can easily pick up viruses and once contaminated, hands can transfer the virus to your eyes, nose or mouth.  From there, the virus can enter your body and make you ill.
general-advice-be-hygienic-description: Covering your mouth and nose with your bent elbow or tissue when you cough or sneeze, and dispose of the used tissue immediately.
general-advice-self-isolate-description: If you develop flu like symptoms you should self-isolate as a precautionary measure and avoid the risk of spreading the infection by staying at home.
